changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR NOT NULL, second_name VARCHAR NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR NOT NULL, login VARCHAR NOT NULL, password VARCHAR NOT NULL );
